tool_description: A REST API that checks for disposable and invalid emails
title: MailValid

api_list.name: Check lists
api_list.description: The route for checking the lists of disposable or non disposable emails
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com/api/lists"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Email Validation
api_list.description: The route for validating an email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Email Validation

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mailvalid1.p.rapidapi.com"
